REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f1811 reute r f BC-SUNTRUST-BANKS-<STI> 04-01 0043

TEXT.TITLE: SUNTRUST BANKS <STI> RAISES PRIME TO 7-3/4 PCT
TEXT.BODY: SunTrust Banks said that Sun Banks in Florida and Trust Co banks in Georgia have raised their prime rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct. The company said the action is effective immediately. Reuter
